s3_bucket_name.title: S3 Bucket Name
s3_bucket_name.description: The name of the S3 bucket.

s3_bucket_path.description: Directory under the S3 bucket where data will be written.

s3_access_key_id.description: The access key id to access the S3 bucket. Airbyte requires Read and Write permissions to the given bucket.
s3_access_key_id.title: S3 Key Id

s3_secret_access_key.description: The corresponding secret to the access key id.
s3_secret_access_key.title: S3 Access Key
